targets.query: SELECT last("iowait")+last("system")+last("nice")+last("steal")+last("user") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "cpu" = 'all') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("iowait") FROM "imperva_gw_sar_cpu" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_used")  / last("mem_total") * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_sys" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("swap_used")  / last("swap_total") * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_sys" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_used" ) /4 / ("disk_capacity" /4) * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_disk" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "volume" = '/') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_used" ) /4 / ("disk_capacity" /4) * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_disk" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "volume" = '/boot') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_used" ) /4 / ("disk_capacity" /4) * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_disk" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "volume" = '/data') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("disk_used" ) /4 / ("disk_capacity" /4) * 100 FROM "imperva_gw_disk" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/ AND "volume" = '/var') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("worker_kbps") FROM "imperva_gw_workers" WHERE ("gatewayname" =~ /^$gateway$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "worker" fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM imperva_gw_hades WITH KEY=gatewayname
list.label: Gateway
list.name: gateway
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM imperva_gw_hades WITH KEY=gatewayname
